description:
Fun to say, even more fun to eat. This hearty Middle Eastern stew is a welcome treat after a hard day on the trail.

  • Packaging clearly shows allergens and nutritional information, and has a graduated scale on one side, so you know how much water to add
  • Ingredients: precooked rice, shredded Monterey jack cheese (milk, salt, enzymes, potato starch), tomato powder, Romano cheese powder (Romano cheese [milk, bacterial cultures, salt, enzymes], disodium phosphate), dried whole egg product (whole egg, corn starch, salt, citric acid, xanthan gum), red and green bell peppers, parmesan cheese powder (parmesan cheese [partially skimmed milk, bacterial cultures, salt, enzymes], disodium phosphate), tomato flakes, onion, potato starch, sugar, textured soy flour, sea salt, dried garlic, milk ingredients, paprika, crushed red pepper, cumin, cayenne pepper, cilantro
  • Allergens - contains: eggs, milk and soy
  • No cooking needed, simply add water, stir, wait and enjoy
  • Meals have a 5-year shelf life
name: AlpineAire Shakshuka
